hero.title: The Woodestic Games
hero.paragraph1: Our passion is to bring joy into families’ everyday lives within minutes through handcrafted wooden board games, so that genuine human connections can thrive in this digital world.
hero.paragraph2: Our belief is that life’s ultimate goal is to have fulfilling experiences. Since introducing Woodestic Crokinole boards in 2012, we have continuously improved our products’ quality and appeal. We take pride in crafting each unique board.

testimonials.title: Our customers said
items:

Visiting your website convinced me indeed that woodestic stands for quality & passion.
The board it self and the way you can compose it with all possible options blows away the competition and the board it self looks of very high quality!”

~ Luis

“It is really beautiful and I’m very pleased with it. Thank you so much for the little holders for the counters. Seriously thank you for the excellent customer service, you make a wonderful product but your service levels are above and beyond many that I have experienced in my life.“

~ Robert

“The board itself is even more wonderful in real life than in the pictures. I'm really happy about my choice for the pattern and the colors.

Since receiving the board, I have played it will children >6 years, with 'hard core' board gamers, with my non-gamer partner, and with grandparents. Everyone loves it. In terms of board games, this is unique to me.

The board has a prominent place in my living room. I will send you a picture directly after this email.

Looking forward to playing and cherishing this board for many more years.”

~Wouter, Netherlands, Crokinole Elite
